Arijit Singh Guitar Tabs / Lead - Best of Arijit Singh - Abhijeet,We have listed just few hit hindi songs of superhit singer Arijit Singh. These songs are not listed according to their rank order but all are brilliant piece of music. Arijit singh is emerging singer of bollywood and one of my favourite, enjoy his song’s guitar tabs.

Arijit Singh is an Indian playback singer and a music programmer. Born in Jiaganj, Murshidabad, West Bengal, his career began upon participating in the reality show Fame Gurukul (2005), in which he lost at the finals. After winning another reality show called 10 Ke 10 Le Gaye Dil, Singh built a recording setup of his own, beginning his journey with music programming. Subsequently, he went to become as an assistant music programmer to Pritam Chakraborty, Shankar-Ehsaan-Loy, Vishal-Shekhar and Mithoon. Read More about

Shreya Ghoshal is an Indian playback singer. Jubin Nautiyal: Tujhe Kitna Chahein Aur Hum Chords | Kabir Singh (Film Version) - Abhijeet,Tujhe kitna chahein aur hum is an intensely heart rendering song that not only strikes our inner chords but also keeps us hooked onto it. From the film Kabir Singh, this track has been sung by the one and only Jubin Nautiyal, composed and penned down by the talented Mithoon. This track is from the feature film soundtrack genre and uses the different types of guitars, the piano and the drums brilliantly. Tujhe kitna chahein aur hum chords are of the medium difficulty level. The guitar chords of Tujhe kitna chahein aur hum are six in number and they are B, G#m, F#, E, C#m, D#m. With a moderately paced tempo and a signature 4/4 beat, the chords of Tujhe kitna chahein aur hum follow a strumming pattern of D D DUDU D. The melody has been played in the B scale and is one of the best sad songs by Bollywood this year.
d – Down Stroke on lower three strings

Dil Hai Toota(C#m) Toote hai Hum(F#)
Tere bin ab(C#m) na lenge ikk bhi dumm(F#)
Tere bin ab(C#m) na lenge ikk bhi dumm(F#)
Dil Hai Toota(C#m) Toote hai Hum(F#)
Tere bin ab(C#m) na lenge ikk bhi dumm(F#)
: We will soon update this article with full chords.

: Tujhe kitna chahein aur hum is filled with a sense of pathos and melancholy in it. The lyrics are extremely heart wrenching and touching. The sorrow of separation and the grief experienced in a pathetic break up has been well carved into rhymes by Mithoon. The song begins with just Jubin’s solo voice devoid of any musical instrument at the background. The guitars and the drums are added after the first verse. This creates a dramatic impact. Jubin’s performance is nothing but spellbinding. His gentle and velvety smooth vocals keep us hooked onto this track. Tujhe kitna chahein aur hum has another romantic version which has been sung by the versatile Arijit Singh and has the name of Tujhe kitna chahte hain hum. Filmed on the handsome Shahid and the pretty Kiara, the song has a different mellow and soothing vibe. This track is perfect for all the heartbroken lovers out there suffering from the woes of a devastating separation. And if you want to get your beloved back or maybe try to move on by submerging yourself totally in music, then strum the chords on your guitar and let music heal you and express your pain.

Ja Chali Ja Guitar Chords with Strumming Pattern | Rishabh Tiwari - Abhijeet,Betrayals and cheating is always devastating and heart breaking. Ja chali ja is a song that supports this above statement. This single has been created and penned down by Tarun Sharma and Rishabh Tiwari and sung by Rishabh himself. From the feature film soundtrack genre, this track uses the trumpets, the guitars and the drums brilliantly. Ja chali ja chords are simple and can be played easily by the beginners as well. The guitar chords of Ja chali ja are five in number which are Am, G, F, Dm, Em. With a moderately paced tempo and a signature 4/4 beat, this melody has been played in the Am scale. The chords of Ja chali ja have a harmonious progression and follow the strumming pattern of  D UDUD UDUD. This track has a quite groovy feel with a very heart rendering and emotional theme and gives out a very strong and powerful message to all the jilted lovers.

Kabir Singh - Guitar: Kaise Hua Chords with Strumming Pattern - Abhijeet,When you are madly in love with someone you often don’t know how or when your heart loses all control and surrenders itself completely to the beloved. Kaise Hua from Kabir Singh is that song which talks about this feeling. Composed and sung by the mellifluous Vishal Mishra, this melody has been penned down by the poetic Manoj Muntashir. From the filmi soundtrack genre this song uses the acoustic and electric guitars and the strings brilliantly. Kaise Hua chords are not very intricate and amateurs can pick them in a jiffy. The chords of Kaise Hua are six in number and they are Bm, F#m, G, A, D, Em. This track has a moderately paced tempo with the signature 4/4 beat and Kaise Hua guitar chords have a harmonious progression with a strumming pattern of D DUDU or D DUDU D. The melody has been played in the Bm scale.

: Kaise hua is a song that will make you fall in love with it. This melody has a very romantic sensation and the amorous lyrics are too relatable. We often do not know when we lose our hearts and fall for someone and how that one person can mean the world to us. Muntashir has given these indescribable feelings a rhyme and rhythm and this shows his amazing skills. Mishra is just beyond praise. His voice is quite like Atif Aslam’s in terms of the tonal quality and therefore his dulcet and soothing crooning tug the strings of our hearts. The song has a soft tune and more focus has been put on the vocals. This is why this number compels us to come back to it again and again. Filmed on the dashing Shahid and the beautiful Kiara, the video of this track is quite lovely to watch. The melody is truly addictive and just ideal for every love struck guy hit by Cupid’s arrow. And if you’re planning to dedicate a song to your lady love to surprise her, then play this song for her to make her blush and come straight running to you to serenade in your arms.

,New,new
Pehla Pyaar Chords with Strumming Pattern (Guitar) | Kabir Singh - Abhijeet,First love is unforgettable. It is always special and has a different feeling altogether. You can not get over that love ever. Pehla pyar from Kabir Singh justifies this statement aptly. Sung by the mellifluent Armaan Malik, this song has been composed by the talented Vishal Mishra and penned by the poetic Irshad Kamil. This melody uses the acoustic guitars and the bass wonderfully and hails from the filmi soundtrack genre. Pehla pyar chords are simple and easy and the beginners can play them effortlessly. There are five chords of Pehla pyar which are E, A, B, G#m, C#m. The song has been played in the E scale. There is a smooth progression of Pehla pyar guitar chords and they follow a strumming pattern of DDU UDU . This track has a moderately paced tempo with a signature 4/4 beat and a very pacifying and relaxing tune which is quite addictive.
d – Down Stroke on lower three strings
[A]Meelon ka ho saalon ka ho [B]jaaye woh

: Pehla pyar is a song that everyone of us can relate to. Love is a sweet feeling that happens to everyone once in a lifetime and this melody exactly talks about those emotional ride our heart takes us on. Irshad has like always showed us his magic by penning down exactly those feelings which we experience. The beauty and the charms of the beloved and how the heart completely surrenders to her has been well carved into rhyme by this amazing lyricist. Armaan Malik is beyond praise. His dulcet crooning and his gentle vocals are sheer bliss to the ears. You can not help but come back to this melody again and again. Mishra has done a commendable job with his team by composing such a beautiful melody. It is completely a smooth flow of rhythm which refreshes the tired soul. Filmed on the handsome Shahid and the lovely Kiara, their chemistry is just sensational to watch. So well, if you want to impress your crush or tell your lover how much you adore and admire her then play this song to her because this is just the ideal romantic number that will not only win her heart but also make her head over heels in love with you.

,New,new
Article 15: Intezari Chords with Strumming Pattern | Armaan Malik - Abhijeet,Intezari is the love song of the decade. With its perfect beats and that heart rendering tune this song is set to rule our hearts. From the film Article 15, this song has been sung by the mellifluous Armaan Malik, composed by the talented Anurag Saikia and the poetic Shakeel Azmi. From the feature film soundtrack genre, this song uses the guitars, the tabla, the piano and several other classical instruments brilliantly. Intezari chords are simple and easy and the amateurs can play them with ease. There are seven guitar chords of Intezari which are Em, D, C, G, A, Am, & B. The melody has a moderately paced tempo and a signature 4/4 beat. The chords of Intezari have a harmonious progression with a strumming pattern of D DU UD or D DD DD or DDU (c) UDU. This track has been played in the Em scale. This song is just beyond all praise.
: D DD DD or DDU (c) UDU
d – Down Stroke on lower three strings
: Em, D, C, G, A, Am, & B
: D DU UD or D DD DD or DDU (c) UDU

: Intezari has a different feeling and sensation. The lyrics wreck of the patience and the dedication with which we are ready to wait for our beloved after a separation. The melody has a tinge of sadness and a mellow mood but also sings about how the beloved has all the power to heal the love sick man. The tune is doleful and has that wistful feeling we experience in love. Armaan Malik has once again won our hearts with his stellar performance. His smooth and velvety vocals have just weaved a magic spell on us and it is for him that we are forced to listen to this song on loop. There is a chorus in between the verses and in the ending which adds a very Ghazal like feeling to this melody. Every lover in a pensive mood can relate to this song. This track has two other versions that have been used in the film- one by Asees Kaur and another by Ayushmann himself. And if you want to make up for the tiff that you had with your lover then play this song to her and see how the anger melts into love and happiness in a moment.

,New,new
Guitar: Sajna Ve Chords Lisa Mishra & Vishal Mishra with Strumming Pattern - Abhijeet,Sajna ve is an intensely romantic and a heart warming melody sung by the mellifluous duo – Vishal Mishra and Lisa Mishra. This song has been composed by Vishal Mishra himself and penned by Akshay Tripathy and Vishal Mishra. This is a song that uses the acoustic guitars and some additional guitars. Sajna ve chords are of a medium level of difficulty and a little skill is needed on the part of the guitarist to strum the chords. The chords of Sajna ve are G#m, D#m, E, F#, C#, B. This number has a moderately paced tempo with a signature 4/4 beat. There is a smooth progression of Sajna ve guitar chords and the strumming pattern is D UUD UUD or D UDUD U. The song has been played in the G#m scale. This track is a ballad from the pop genre and the sweet tune and the amorous lyrics will definitely make you play this melody on loop.
: D UUD UUD or D UDUD U
d – Down Stroke on lower three strings
: G#m/Abm, D#m/Ebm, E, F#, C#/Db, B
: D UUD UUD or D UDUD U

: Sajna ve is the perfect love song. It is definitely one of the best love songs produced by the Hindi music industry. This single has intensely passionate lyrics which sing about how the beloved has entranced and enchanted the lover and smitten him or her with his or her charms. The music is very soothing and calming and has a quite refreshing feeling. You can not help but smile and reminisce your lover whenever you hear this song. Vishal Sharma has a very gentle and mellifluent voice which is sheer bliss to the ears. Lisa has bewitching vocals. Her voice is very powerful and has a rich tonal quality. Their crooning in the end is very beautiful and you are compelled to fall in love with this song. The melody is like the sweet summer tempest and is truly rejuvenating and relaxing. The video of this song is quite a treat to the eyes. This number is surely evergreen and will continue to rule our hearts in the coming decades as well. Sajna ve is ideal for a long drive or a slow romantic dance with your lover serenading in your arms. And well if you have to impress your someone special then strum the guitar chords of Sajna ve and make her fall head over heels in love with you.

,New,new
Guitar: Tere Bin Kive Chords with Strumming | Ramji Gulati | Jannat Zubair & Mr. Faisu - Abhijeet,Tere bin kive is a very romantic number that instantly brings a smile on your face. It is a single sung and composed by the mellifluous Ramji Gulati and penned down by the poetic Moody and Akhtar. This track uses the violin, guitars, the drums and the other string and wind instruments. Tere bin kive chords are simple and easy. There are three guitar chords of Tere bin kive which are F#, B & C#. There is also an additional chord which is G#m. The melody has a moderately paced tempo and a signature 4/4 beat. Tere bin kive guitar chords have a smooth and harmonious progression and a strumming pattern of D DUUD or DD UDUD. The song has been played in the F# scale. This amorous number is of the feature film soundtrack genre and has a very groovy beat which will make you sway to its catchy tune.

: Tere bin kive is a Punjabi track and therefore has the typical Punjabi jovial and bubbly feel. It has a very happy mood and you can not help but snap your fingers and tap your feet. The lyrics are filled with the flavour of love and sing about how the love smitten guy can not live without the beloved. The lyrics are quite conversational. The tune is addictive and it will haunt you throughout the day. Ramji is as usual marvellous and his gentle and soothing voice is quite a treat to the ears. Tere bin kive is a very sweet song and is quite the mood lifter. The melody has been filmed on Jannat, Ramji, Mr. Faisu and Aayan and the video is indeed mesmerising to watch. The track is ideal for a date night or for all those jilted one sided lovers who still haven’t confessed their deep hidden feelings to their crush. And if you are planning to propose your someone special in such a way that she cant refuse you, or make your lover feel special, then strum the chords of this song and see how your charm entices her making her go all crazy for you.

,New,new
Super 30 | Jugraafiya Chords with Strumming Pattern (Guitar) - Abhijeet,Jugraafiya is a song that has the usual bubbly and cheerful feeling which instantly enlightens your mood and makes you happy and smiling. From the film Super 30 this track has been sung by the evergreen Udit Narayan and the melodious Shreya Ghoshal, composed by the genius Ajay Atul and penned down by the poetic Amitabh Bhattacharya. This melody from the feature film soundtrack genre uses the different guitars, drums and other string instruments mellifluously. Jugraafiya chords are simple and not much intricate. There are seven guitar chords of Jugraafiya which are Gm, Dm, A#, D#, D, Cm, & F. With a moderately paced tempo and a signature 4/4 beat, the chords of Jugraafiya have a harmonious progression with a strumming pattern of DD DU DD. This melody has been played in the Gm scale. This number has a very bubbly sensation and is quite an addictive and catchy song.
d – Down Stroke on lower three strings
: Gm, Dm, A#, D#, D, Cm, & F
[A#]Tujh se jo mil ke ma[F]za hai
Kahan woh ga[D#]nit ke sawaalon me [D]hai

: Jugraafiya is a sweet romantic song. Here the word Jugraafiya is a distortion of the word geography and the song croons about how the beloved has changed the geography of the lover’s heart. The lyrics are too conversational and capture the feelings a teenage lover experiences, that innocence of his love and the excitement that love showers on him. The song has that old 90s feeling that Udit Narayan with his velvety vocals and a dulcet and gentle voice has captured rightly. Shreya is mellifluent as usual and keep us hooked onto this number with her mesmerising vocals. The song has a very rapid flow of rhythm that will make you tap your feet and snap your fingers as you sway to the tune. It has a perfect beat for performing a small jig. The tune is just too refreshing and rocking but in a smooth and relaxing way. Filmed on the stunning Mrunal and the only Greek God of Bollywood, the most handsome man Hrithik Roshan, the video is just a treat to the eyes. This song is a mood lifter and if you want to serenade with your lover in your arms and perform a romantic waltz or ballet, well then look no further because this is the right song for you.

This song is a heart wrenching rendition and is a taunt to the society who speak a lot about women safety but do very little to protect them. : Bandeya is a song with a Punjabi feel and has a very folk feeling about it. The lyrics talk about a wistful love and very beautifully express an emotion which is indescribable. Kafir has magically penned down all the thoughts we experience when we are having a tumultuous relation with our beloved. The music is quite soothing and soft and one can feel that note of sadness in the mellow tune. Arijit Singh needs no further praise as his crooning is beyond perfection. His powerful and velvety smooth vocals indeed compel us to listen to this track on the repeat mode. Bandeya is a very emotional song that is immensely addictive and pacifying. It harmonises well with the pensive rainy afternoon mood when you are one with solitude reminiscing those happy times you spent with your beloved. Filmed on the lovely Tapsee Pannu and the charming Saqib Saleem, their on screen chemistry is very mesmerising. This track is perfect for all the jilted lovers and for those who are having a tiff with their lovers. And if you want to make up for the fight and apologise to your better half, then play this song on your guitar and see how the quarrels become history and how love reigns.
: Chal Ve Tu Bandeya Us Galiye

From the super hit film Bajrangi Bhaijaan, this melody has been sung by the mellifluous K.K., composed by the maestro Pritam and penned by Kausar Munir. This track hails from the feature film soundtrack genre and uses guitars and other string instruments brilliantly. Tu jo mila chords are easy and simple and can be played by the amateurs effortlessly. There is a harmonious progression of the chords of Tu jo mila and the number has a moderately paced tempo and a signature 4/4 beat. The guitar chords of Tu jo mila are C, Em, Am, G, F & Dm. This melody has been played in the C scale and the strumming pattern of the chords are D DD DDD or D UDUD UDUD. This song is a heart warming number which is quite addictive and will make you listen to it on loop.

: Tu jo mila is a melody that celebrates and appreciates the special people present in our lives. It is a song that eulogizes all those who make our lives worth living. There is a flavour of love induced by Munir in the heart touching lyrics. The music is immensely relaxing and soothing. The soft music harmonises well with the happy and restful mood. Pritam shows us his creative genius once again by composing such a beautiful piece that has a classical touch along with the western feel. K.K. has given us a stellar performance and keeps us spell bound by his gentle and dulcet vocals. Whenever K.K. and Pritam come together we can be assured of a path breaking track and this song is by no means an exception. : Humne rait pe is a very amorous song with a lot of passion and love. The lyrics are extremely conversational and metaphorical. With the use of some Urdu words in between the verses , the song has a very rich and profound meaning. Love has been shown in a very poetic manner in this melody. The song has a very pacifying music and this melody has no crests or troughs in between. Tony has showed us his genius once again in this number. His dulcet and gentle voice is very captivating and it is for him that we are bound to come back to this track again and again and listen to it on loop. Neha is undoubtedly bewitching and her melodious vocals are just beyond praise. Filmed on the handsome Karanveer and the stunning Priya, their on screen chemistry is just sizzling to watch and this video is a treat to the eyes. Humne rait pe is perfect for a romantic dinner date or a long drive with your better half. And well, if you’re planning to confess your passionate love to your someone special whom you still haven’t yet told about your feelings, then say them loud by playing this song to her and see how she falls in love with you within a few moments.

: Zindagi di paudi is an immensely romantic song and shows the power of love and commitment. If two people are mad about each other and have nothing in between them but dedication and pure love then even death can not tear them apart. And this is what Nirmaan captures beautifully in this melody. The music is also very heart rendering and has quite a lot of trills, some crests and troughs which makes it pleasing to the ears. The strings accompanied by the guitars create a very heart wrenching tune and the flute in the interludes just adds to the charm of this track. Gaba is as usual stellar and his dulcet voice perfectly captures the emotions intended in this song. His passion has been enchantingly brought out by his mellifluent vocals. The video of this song featuring Gaba himself and the pretty Janna, is just touching and extremely emotional. This song is nothing but a soulful rendition and is definitely one of the most popular love songs created by the Punjabi music industry. So if you want to show your beloved the depth of your love and the dedication with which you are committed to her, then this is the perfect song for you.

Sometimes parting and separation is indeed heart-breaking and depressing. Royee Jande Naina, a single by the versatile Nitin Gupta released in Zee Music Originals is that song which will understand this feeling of pain. This heart rendering song has been composed by the talented Vivek Kar and penned by the poetic Kumaar. The song is of the pop and Sufi genre and this melody uses the guitars, the ukuleles, the bouzouki and the sarangi beautifully to create that doleful music. The guitar based song has novice level guitar chords and the amateur can learn them in an instant. The progression of the chords is harmonious and subtle. The song has a moderately paced tempo with a signature 4/4 beat and is indeed a soulful rendition.

: This song reeks of melancholy and a sense of pathos. Betrayal and parting is the worst thing that can ever happen to someone and Kumaar has artfully carved this unexpressed grief into words. The lyrics are extremely heart rendering and conversational and one can relate to them if he or she is going through an excruciating pain from a devastating break up. The lyrics have been written in Punjabi and therefore add that Sufi feeling to this melody. The music is very soothing and soft and has a rustic charm about it. The use of the different classical instruments gives that folk touch to this number. Nitin Gupta has done a commendable and praiseworthy job. His dulcet and gentle vocals are very soothing and compel the listeners to play this song on loop. His crooning is indeed euphonious and pleasant to the ears and one cannot help but feel and harmonise with the emotions in his voice.

: Royee Janda Naina is a sad song that very melodiously captures the emotions and pains of a broken and shattered heart and anyone facing these can find themselves in sync with this track. The song has a very dejected and woeful mood and this is quite compatible to the pensive and crestfallen lover. The song is truly splendid in all sense and this is a song that will always be evergreen in the coming years too. Filmed on Abhishek Bajaj, Radhika Bangia and Akshay Kapoor, the video of this single is very sad and tragic. This song has another version as well sung by Nitin Gupta himself and this version has been used in the film Shaadi Mein Zaroor Aana. This version is also heart wrenching and quite moving. Due credit must be given to the entire team who have worked hard to gift us this gem of a song. This song will help you to let out your angst and heal from the traumatic situation if you have been badly betrayed or left by your beloved and you find yourself submerged in pitiful tears, sorrow and the memories of the bygone lover. And if you want to give shape to your anguish, strum the chords on your guitar and let music heal your despairing soul.

: Maa is an emotional song. Often we take our mothers for granted, do not treat her well, expect her to do things for us without appreciating her for once but we never realise that she is the only person for whom we exist. Puneet Sharma has done a commendable job by carving into rhyme and rhythm those feelings which we harbour in our hearts for our mothers but seldom tell her. The lyrics are extremely heart rendering and touching. The tune is quite doleful and has a melancholic feel about it. The music is very soothing and refreshing and is quite pleasant to the ears. The backing vocals add to the charm of this song. Amitabh Bachchan is beyond all praise. This veteran actor with his baritone vocals steals away our hearts. Yajat Garg has mesmerised us with his sweet, childish dulcet voice and he along with Mr. Bachchan both have kept us enchanted with their stellar performances.
: Amitabh Bachchan, Yajat Garg & Diksha Garg (Backing Vocals)

: Maa is a homage to all those Angels present in our lives. We always cry over trivial stuff, end our lives or get depressed about love and over people who do not care about us, take care of our lovers and dedicate our lives to them; but do we ever think of that person who stayed up all night when we were sick or gave us that last piece of cake even though she was hungry or maybe wanted to eat. Do we ever think about that lady who sacrificed everything for us just to see us smile? Do we appreciate that fairy who never ate a morsel just because we didn’t eat anything? The list of a mother’s contribution is endless and we can not even repay the countless debts we owe to her. Maa is a brilliant song dedicated to all these strong ladies. The use of a child voice and Mr. Bachchan’s voice shows beautifully that aaeven if we grow old, irrespective of our ages; we will always be a baby to our mothers and we will always be incomplete without them even if we have everything or maybe have a child or grandchild. So as mother’s day is round the corner, strum this song on your guitar to your mother and take a moment to appreciate her and thank her and make her smile with pride beaming in her eyes for you.

: Fakeera is the romantic song of the year. There is a feeling of freshness and newness in the melody and that is what makes this track so endearing to the audience. Like Pareshan from Ishaqzaade, I Love You from Bodyguard, Kya Karun from Barfi and Te Amo from Dum Maro Dum; Fakeera can be added to this list of songs that talk about this new and crazy feeling of falling in love. The song is intensely serenading with a very amorous sensation about it. Shot in a college set, this song has been filmed on the pretty Ananya Pandey and the talented Tiger Shroff. . This film is a debut for Ananya and her romance with Tiger on-screen is very natural and sizzling and it is indeed a delight to watch. Fakeera is a song that will continue to entice us even after decades and this track will remain evergreen forever. The song is ideal for you if you are planning to serenade with your lover on a romantic date, or if you are in solitude and want to get engrossed in the thoughts of your better half. : Break ups, parting and separation are indeed very painful and moving on is the toughest part in this entire process. This song is quite a push and an aid to help one get over their ex-lover and banish from the mind all the memories of her as the lyrics urge us to move on and forget the bygone beloved. The lyrics are filled with a sense of pathos and melancholy and are indeed heart rendering. The introductory music and the piece played in the interludes on the guitars are truly stellar and mind boggling. The tune is quite harmonising to the pensive mood and keeps us hooked onto this amazing number. Farooki has an immensely smooth and velvety voice and his powerful vocals have a rich classical tonal quality. The ending over tune sung by him is indeed beyond all praise and this just shows how astounding and remarkable his vocal skills are.

: Bhula do is the debut of this band -Raeth. This song was released more than a decade ago and had become the number one song on MTV charts then. But till today it continues to enchant us and keeps us bound under its spell. Bhula do will always remain evergreen and will captivate us in the future years as well. Raeth is an Indian-Pakistan sufi pop rock band and with their debut performance proved to us that music transcends everything, every boundary and every bond. Mankind separates mankind but it is music that unites us all and this has been well testified by Raeth. Bhula do is a very special song for the millennial kids and teens and also for the 90s kids; because this was one of the songs that defined our childhood, and still brings back to us those countless memories of the past and some fond nostalgia. This melody reminds one of the innocent crush at school, or some incomplete love story in the teen years and that is why we find this track so endearing. So if you want to take your fellow mates on a trip to their young good old days then strum the chords of this song on your guitar and feel those past thoughts come flooding back to you.

The background music is very subtle with just the rocking beats to maintain the rhythm. The song focuses more on the vocals and that’s why it is more endearing to the audience. The lyrics are extremely conversational and romantic. This track has portrayed love and its captivating feeling in a very bubbly and joyful way and that is why you are bound to hear this number on loop. The charms of the beloved and the depth of the love of the love smitten guy have been carved into a euphonious melody by Raja Chanda. The song has been sung by the versatile Jubin Nautiyal and it is for his voice that the audience is compelled to come back to this melody. There is a Hindi rap performed in between the verses brilliantly by Parry G which makes this track indeed bewitching.

,New,new
Chal Para Chords by Strings Band (Guitar/Piano/Ukulele) - Abhijeet,“Zindagi na Milegi Dobara!” Isn’t it? Then why do we live subdued and suppressed and why can’t we just follow our dreams and passions? Chal Para from 30 by Strings is that song which will make you think and ponder over your life. Composed by the versatile Strings, the song was sung by Faisal Kapadia and penned by the other members of the band. The soundtrack hails from the pop genre and uses the different guitars, the bass, the piano and the drums masterfully. This guitar based song has novice level chords that can be played by the freshers effortlessly. The progression of the chords is harmonious and subtle. The tempo of this song is moderately paced and has a signature 4/4 beat. This melody is a soulful rendition.
: D DU UDU UDU UDU or D D D D D D D D
d – Down Stroke on lower three strings
: A, D, E, Em, Bm, G, F#m

: This track is just a proper example of a rock band performance. With those various acoustic guitars and the drums, this song plays on, captivating all our hearts. Faisal has an evergreen voice and his gentle yet powerful vocals mesmerise us totally. Faisal performs this melody in a stellar manner and keeps us spell bound. The lyrics are very thought provoking and life inspiring. In this world of anxiety where we are living a robotic life tied to deadlines, goals and a zest to better others, do we live for ourselves? Do we follow our hopes or dreams? Chal Para will make you give your aims a thought and will inspire you to just walk away and follow your heart as it is never wrong. Many people require a push to tread the path less travelled by and this number is just that push that you have been looking for.

: Chal Para is a song that is indeed motivational and will make you question your life and inspire you to follow the path your heart leads you to. Strings has done a commendable job in making a song so wonderful and alluring. This rock band from Pakistan has once again proved to us that music transcends all boundaries and unites humanity. Borders may separate us but music is strong enough to bring everyone together and Chal Para is that song which testifies this claim. The video of this song has been filmed on the members of the Strings themselves and seeing them on screen is an immense delight. This groovy melody will always remain a timeless piece and will continue to enchant us in the coming years as well. The serenading rhythm and those musical pieces played on the guitars and the bass is beyond perfection. The piano at the background is quite soothing and soft and gives a very refreshing vibe to this melody. This track is the ideal companion on a long solo trip, or a long drive or on a nostalgic and pensive lazy afternoon. And if you are looking for any melody that you can strum on your guitar for the jamming sessions then Chal Para is the right song for you.

Guitar: Anxiety Chords by Selena Gomez & Julia Michaels - Abhijeet,Chords of Anxiety by Julia Michaels featuring Selena Gomez is a path-breaking and upbeat song. This soundtrack is way unique and different from all the songs the English music industry has composed till date. The melody was sung by Julia and Selena and lyrics were written by Julia Michaels, Scott Harris, Ian Kirkpatrick and Selena Gomez. Anxiety features in the album Inner Monologue Part 1, and tops the US Billboard music chart. The melody was created by using the acoustic guitars and that adds the slick groovy charm to this number. The song hails from the pop genre and has a moderately paced tempo with a signature 4/4 beat. This guitar based song has novice level guitar chords that can be learnt by the amateurs in a jiffy. The progression of the chords is smooth and harmonious.

: This song is diverse from the other songs because of its theme. Anxiety and depression is a very crucial health problem that requires urgent help and should never be neglected. However we still consider mental health as something trivial and are not aware about the seriousness it poses. But this powerful duo has brilliantly brought out these facts and the impacts and effects of isolation and disquietude through this track. The song has a flavour of self-deprecating humour and the experience and the feeling of anxiety. The beat of this track is intensely snappy and feet tapping. The use of just the guitars with the dulcet and mellow vocals imparts that unplugged sensation to this track. Julia and Selena are beyond praise. Selena as usual keeps us hooked onto this song with her mellifluous voice. Julia’s performance is stellar and spell binding. The plucky rhythm, the thought provoking lyrics and the mesmerising crooning compel us to listen to this song on loop.

: Anxiety is a song that will set a new trend. Unlike other pop stars who sing about parties and unlimited booze and crazy chicks, Anxiety deals with serious issues like a fragile and vulnerable state of mind. This song is a bit autobiographical because Selena herself was undergoing depression and was seeking for help from it. Therefore her struggles and the experiences she was facing have been penned down in this melody. The song is also emblematic of women empowerment as two women here talk about significant topics and do not just fight over a man for his time or attention. The melody is quite soulful and every person who is in trauma or some agony can relate to this song. The message that Anxiety tries to convey to us is that it is okay to face psychological issues and we should not keep it hidden. We should speak up and ask for immediate help and also help those in distress. Overall, this song is poppy and quite addictive and will make you hum the chorus all through the day. The number is sure to keep us glued to it in the future as well and will always remind us of one thing- that everything is and will be alright.

,New,new
Ankit Tiwari - Guitar: Ishq Kare Barbadiyaan Chords with Strumming - Abhijeet,Betrayals, separations, misunderstandings- all are a part and parcel of our lives. Love can be destroying at times. Ishq kare barbadiyan by Ankit Tiwari is a song that sums up these feelings very well. Composed by the maestro Vivek Kar and penned by the poetic Kumaar, this melody is a heart rendering number. From the filmy soundtrack genre, this song uses the guitars, the ukulele, the violin, the bouzouki and the rabab harmoniously to create this soulful tune. The guitar chords are-
which are a bit hard chords for a beginners because of the barre. The scale in which the melody has to be played is
. The strumming pattern of this melody is
. This track is nothing but a melancholic rendition with a moderately paced tempo and signature 4/4 beats.

Jisnu [D#] ishq ki [F] hawa lgdi aye

: Ishq kare barbadiyan is a song with a deep sense of pathos. The agony of getting cheated and played on has been beautifully captured in this track. The melody has a very strong message for all the people who are suffering from such a devastating trauma that love can break you and ruin you and is often not as enchanting as it seems to be. The music is immensely doleful and is quite harmonious to the pensive mood. The lyrics are extremely conversational and heart rendering. The excruciating pain that love can induce has been well presented in rhythm and rhyme. This single is definitely one of the best sad songs ever composed by Bollywood. This heart wrenching number has an emotional video that every crestfallen lover can relate to. The woes of a jilted lover can be felt deeply in the emotions present in Tiwari’s soothing and mellifluous vocals. This song is quite harmonizing to a dejected and upset mood and can act as a healing touch for your broken and shattered heart. And if you want to give a shape to your sorrow, strum those simple chords on your guitar and let music release your pain and heal you.

,New,new
India's Most Wanted - Guitar: Akela Chords with Strumming - Abhijeet,Love, break ups, sadness, happiness are all a part and parcel of our lives, but there are moments when we are all alone with no friends by our side and even self-confidence and motivation from walked away from us. For those moments, Akele from India’s Most Wanted is a song that will help you pass those obstacles. Sung by Abhijeet Srivastava, this melody has been composed by Amit Trivedi and penned by Amitabh Bhattacharya. With trumpets, violins and guitars the soulful music has been created. The guitar chords are of the novice level and can be learned by the beginners in a jiffy. The progression of the chords is harmonious and the song has a moderately paced tempo with a signature 4/4 beat. This track is of the filmy soundtrack genre and is indeed a soothing number.
d – Down Stroke on lower three strings

Haar [B] jaane se[A] phle na [E] mukar

: Often we find ourselves losing hope and despairing because no one stands by us. But what we fail to understand is that we alone are sufficient to handle all our troubles and fearlessly walk on and brush off all our insecurities. This feeling has been melodiously portrayed into those inspiring lyrics by Amitabh Bhattacharya. The music is very harmonious and soothing and Amit Trivedi has yet again showed us his creative genius by gifting us this gem of a song. There is no trough and crest in the rhythm and the song is a smooth flow of music and beats. What makes this song even more unique is the theme of the song. Abhijeet Srivastava has a gentle and velvety smooth voice and his deep and baritone vocals make this song endearing to the audience. The way he performs with all his emotions and heart gives the song its charm and beauty and compels us to play it on loop.

: Akela is a song that will help us to pick ourselves up, dust ourselves off and lead on into the battle of life. It is like a war cry to those suffering from loneliness and depression and loss of hope. The melody is indeed praiseworthy and this song is a healing touch to the distressed and lost souls. Bollywood has given us songs for all moods and occasions be it parties, or festivals, or love or separation to name a few. And Bollywood has showed us again it’s diversity by presenting us with a track that will motivate us and help us to walk on in life. The song has a feel that is similar to Aashayein from Iqbal and there is nothing but a very positive vibe from these songs. Filmed on the dashing Arjun Kapoor the video of this track is really a delight to watch. The song is quite harmonising if you are in a pensive mood, but as Tagore said Ekla Cholo Re, this melody also inspires us to lead on and not look back; to walk forward as we alone are enough for ourselves. This song is ideal for covering on your guitar and if you want to help out your friend, who is suffering from hopelessness, then strum it on your guitar to boost his confidence and help him regain hope and happiness.

,New,new
Dil Royi Jaye Chords with Strumming | Guitar | De De Pyar De - Abhijeet,There are times when you feel blue and all dismayed and gloomy because the memories of your past lover come back flooding to you. Dil Roye Jaaye from De De Pyar De is that song which validates this claim. Sung by the mellifluous Arijit Singh, this melody has been composed by the versatile Rochak Kohli and penned down by the poetic Kumaar. This song uses the guitars, the drums and the other instruments very beautifully to create this mesmerising symphony. This guitar based song has simple level chords that can be picked up by the amateurs with ease. The progression of the chords is subtle and harmonious. From the filmi soundtrack genre, this song has a moderately paced tempo with a signature 4/4 beat.
: DU (c) U U(c) or D UDUD

: DU (c) U U(c) or D UDUD

: Break ups and separations are quite painful and agonizing and the lyrics of this melody captures these feelings poetically. The crying heart due to the absence of the beloved has been showcased in these heart rendering lyrics beautifully and we cannot help but relate to the truth of the words. Rochak Kohli has done a commendable job once again by composing such a heart wrenching track. The tune is a smooth flow of rhyme and rhythm with no crests and troughs in between. The rhythm runs leisurely and has a very soothing and gentle sensation. The background instruments are subtle and make this track even more enchanting. Arijit Singh however steals the show. With his stellar performance, he keeps us spell bound and bewitched. His voice has a rich cadence and his tonal quality is velvety smooth. His heartfelt performance compels us to come back to this track again and again.

: Dil roye jaaye is an immensely emotional song. The lyrics are quite thought provoking and strike the inner chords of the hearts. Arijit Singh, who is the king of sad songs, has yet again justified this title of his by giving us this melancholic melody akin to Agar tum saath ho, Kabira and Kalank. The guitars and the drums have been used in a very beautiful way that imparts a very doleful mood to this melody. The song has been filmed on the pretty Rakul Preet, stunning Tabu and the evergreen Ajay Devgan and the video of this track is a treat to the eyes. This number is all set to break records and captivate us in the coming years as well. The song is ideal and very relatable if you are suffering from a painful break up and cannot forget all those bitter and sweet moments that you spent with your beloved. If you are in a pensive mood and in a heartbroken state, this melody will definitely harmonise with your present condition. And if you want to shape your grief in the form of music, then strum those chords on the guitar and show the world how talented you are.

,New,new
Papon - Guitar: Ik Mod Chords with Strumming Pattern | Music Teacher - Abhijeet,Ik Mod from Music Teacher is an intensely romantic song which beautifully portrays how wonderful love is. Sung by the mellifluous Papon, this number has been composed by the maestro Rochak Kohli and penned by the poetic Aadheesh Verma. This song uses the guitars melodiously and this guitar based song has novice level guitar chords which the amateurs can play with ease. The Ik mod chords are D#, A#, G#, F#, F, Fm, Cm with a strumming pattern D DU UUD. The strumming pattern can be played with the mainly down strokes also and the key used in this melody is D#. The song has a moderately paced tempo with signature 4/4 beats and a soothing rhythm. From the filmi soundtrack genre, this song is a soulful rendition with a very relaxing effect.
d – Down Stroke on lower three strings
: D#, A#, G#, F#, F, Fm, Cm

: This song has an intensely groovy feel with a profound sense of refreshment. The music has that unplugged vibe and that is why it is very endearing to the audience. Rochak Kohli has indeed done a commendable job in composing such an enchanting track. Like Pal, Rozana and Nain na Jodeen, this melody is another gem that Kohli gifted us with. The lyrics are very conversational and metaphorical and are filled with the flavour of romance and love. Papon has an extremely powerful and mellifluent voice which is immensely soothing to the tired and weary soul. This track also has a female version sung by Neeti Mohan which is very heart warming. Filmed on Manav Kaul, Amrita Bagchi, Neena Gupta and Divya Dutta in breath taking locales, the video is a delight to watch. This song is perfect for a pensive mood or for someone looking for repose in solitude. This track is nothing but bliss and is one of the best romantic songs, and for all the talented and amazing guitarists out there, this song is perfect for a jamming session or a performance in your college fest where you can show off your adept skills to the world.

,New,new
Main Bhi Nahin Soya Guitar Chords | SOTY 2 - Abhijeet,There are moments of tension and misunderstanding in every relationship that causes quite a wistful pain to us. Main bhi nahi soya from Student of the Year 2 is that soulful track that justifies this statement. Sung by the mellifluous Arijit Singh, this number has been composed by the creative duo Vishal and Shekhar and penned by the poetic Anvita Dutt. This soundtrack has used the guitars and the plucky instruments euphoniously to create the beautiful tune. From the filmi soundtrack genre this song is very serenading and melancholic. With signature 4/4 beats and a slow paced tempo, this song has a harmonious progression of chords with simple guitar chords that the amateurs can pick up in a jiffy. The song is truly a heart rendering melody.
The chords that we have used in this song are C, F, G, Am, Em, Cm, A#/Bb, & E. We recommend you to play this song with DDU UDU or DDU DUDU as the strumming pattern.
d – Down Stroke on lower three strings
: C, F, G, Am, Em, Cm, A#/Bb, & E

: This song has a sense of pathos and woe filled in every bit. The bittersweet arguments thereby leading to days of separation has been portrayed very subtly in this touching number. The lyrics have been written in Punjabi and Hindi and therefore a slow Ghazal like feeling is acquired here. This melody has very conversational and emotional lyrics that indeed strike the chords of our hearts. Vishal and Shekhar as usual are at their best. They have created a melody that not only soothes the soul but also makes the listener come back to it again and again. The guitars and the plucky instruments have been mixed and matched brilliantly and this jugalbandi of the musical instruments is a treat to the ears. Arijit Singh is beyond all praise. With his velvety smooth vocals and that baritone voice he has again given us another stellar performance. He adds that doleful charm to this song and compels us to hear this number on loop.

column2: Zee Originals

column1:
,New,new
Tu Mila to Haina Chords with Capo & Strumming | Guitar - De De Pyar De - Abhijeet,A fresh tune that is all mesmerising and enchanting is Tu mila to hain na from De De Pyar De. The melody is a very soulful rendition that has been composed by the creative genius Amaal Malik, written by the talented Kunaal Verma and sung by the one and only Arijit Singh. The song relies totally on the use of different kinds of guitars namely the acoustic guitars, the electric and the live bass guitars and uses other instruments like the live drums and the flutes. The song has a very groovy rhythm with a signature 4/4 beat and the tempo is quite fast. The melody has easy novice level guitar chords and their progression is quite harmonious. This pop song portrays the feelings of love and romance very beautifully.
: D (c)U U(c)U or DD UUD DDU or D DU D DU
: Em, C, D, G, A, Am
: D DU UDU orD (c)U U(c)U or DD UUD DDU or D DU D DU

: Tu mila toh hain na is a very jovial and bubbly number. Amaal Malik very artfully uses the different guitars to compose this serenading melody. The beats are indeed feet tapping and make one sway to the tune. The back vocals add to the charm of Arijit Singh’s intensely powerful and velvety vocals. Arijit Singh performs this song in a very gentle and smooth voice with some over tunes in the ending of the song. The lyrics are infused with love and amour and talk about how even if its late it is still better that the two lovebirds met each other. The immensely romantic lyrics are very relatable and that’s why they appeal to the masses. Kunaal Verma has really done a wonderful job in capturing the feelings of love and bliss in the poetic verses. The entire song is an addictive track and no one can listen to it just once.

: This song can be called the ‘Love song of the year’. This is because not only does it contain Arijit’s enigmatic performance, but also a very beautiful musical piece performed on the guitars and the drums with flutes in between. The song is enchanting from the very beginning aria that has been strummed on the guitar. The melody has a very refreshing and energetic feel and lights up the listener’s mood instantly. The romantic chemistry of the pretty Rakul Preet and the evergreen Ajay Devgn adds to the lovey-dovey sensation of the soundtrack. This song is a lot similar to the songs like Subha Subha, Sau Asmaan,Ik Vaari Aa etc. in its feels and rhythm, and that’s why this song will just be ideal for you on your prom night or the first couple dance. This tune has been made for a quick jig or a serenading ball dance with your lovely partner-for-life. And well, if you are planning to propose your crush or well, planning to gift a song to your better half for her birthday or your anniversary, then strum those mellifluous and simple chords on your guitar to make her blush and fall madly in love with you.

,New,new
Aaj Se Teri Guitar Chords with Strumming | PADMAN - Abhijeet,Love is a commitment. It is like a full time job where you have to give your 100% and fulfil all the vows you make to your beloved. Aaj se teri by Arijit Singh from the film Padman, is that song that enlists all those promises and sums it up for us. Composed by Amit Trivedi, the words have been penned by Kausar Munir. This song is a soulful rendition and has a very bubbly marriage sensation. Amit Trivedi very beautifully synchronises the shehnai, the mandolin, the saz, the bouzuki, dholak and other percussions and the guitar to give this song that Indian wedding feel. The song has simple guitar chords that can be picked by the amateurs easily. The progression of the chords is subtle and harmonious. The rhythm is a bit fast with signature 4/4 beats making the melody groovy and serenading.

: This soundtrack starts with a very euphonious piece played on the shehnai that instantly gives the wedding vibes. The percussions used here give those heavy beats to this song. Though the song has used many exotic classical instruments beautifully, it yet has a very romantic touch in it because of the amorous lyrics. Munir has done a commendable job by crafting into words all those vows we take around the fire, or during the tying of the knot. The duties that a husband takes upon him when he performs the wedding rituals have been poetically framed into a soothing soundtrack. Arijit Singh as usual makes us spell bound with his deep and sombre vocals. His velvety smooth voice is very pleasant to the ears, and the feet tapping beats, the swaying rhythm and the harmonious vocals make it a very addictive number and the hearer has to come back to it again and again.

: Aaj se teri is a very lovely song but the romance here is a bit different. The song doesn’t talk about love or celebrate it, but it speaks about all the promises and actions that a lover is supposed to fulfil. Action speaks louder than words and this soundtrack clearly illustrates this statement. Shot in the rural locales and filmed on the stunning Radhika Apte and the daring Akshay Kumar, the song is very sweet and the video is pleasant and enjoyable. The movie Padman is a brilliant eye opening film with a powerful theme, and Aaj se teri acts a wonderful message by being a part of it. The song runs for about 5 minutes 12 seconds but in that time frame it makes all the listeners fall in love with this tune. The melody is blissful and refreshing as a new feeling of romance and responsibility has been celebrated in this evergreen romantic chartbuster. So well if you are planning to get hitched and want to perform a lovely dance with your amazing better half, this song is just the one that you have been looking for. And if you want to take that extra step, strum the chords on your guitar on your Sagai, and see how she blushes for you.

,New,new
Linkin Park Numb Guitar Chords with Capo & Strumming [Easy] - Abhijeet,Linkin Park was a band that united people from all over the world. It was not just a group of musicians but an emotion. It was a band which gave us songs for the millennium. Numb from their second album Meteora, is one such songs composed by them. From the nu metal and alternative rock genre, this melody was one of those gems that everyone could relate to. With Chester Bennington’s powerful vocals, Mike Shinoda’s accompanying back vocals and the bass and electric guitars, piano, drums and percussion and the sampler and turntablisms at the background, this track was one of the most popular chartbuster released twelve long years ago. The chords on the guitar are of the novice level of difficulty. The progression is rapid and harmonious. The tempo is quite fast with a signature 4/4 beat. The song is evergreen and is still remains afresh in our hearts.

: This soundtrack is beyond praise. It’s one of the most perfect songs that was ever made. With the soothing and soulful music in spite of being a rock metal, makes us attracted to this song from the very first time we hear it. Numb is one of those musical pieces that talks about the feelings of an introvert teenager who has been outcast and ignored by everyone around her. Well this is a feeling everyone at some point has encountered specially during the time of puberty. That’s why the number is so endearing to the masses specially to the teens. The song is also enchanting because of Chester’s intensely powerful and sturdy vocals. His enigmatic voice has a very insanely dulcet yet strong tonal quality and that’s why the melancholic expressions and the angry outburst, both have been beautifully brought out to us by his voice. He sings the verses in a very gentle and smooth manner and shows the strength of his voice in the chorus.

: Numb will always forever hold a very special place in our hearts. Not because of its emotionally relatable lyrics and the catchy and addictive tune , but because of the nostalgia it brings to us. This was the melody we used to listen when we grew up and this song was our sole companion when we were ignored, abandoned or were too pressurised by some burden and were left all alone. The song was the only mate we had when life was turbulent . And every millennial teen and the kid of course had the entire lyrics by heart as this melody was a part of our lives then. Linkin Park gifted us some melodies that will forever be relished and Numb is one of them. Though Chester is no more with us physically, but Numb will forever immortalise him and he will never be forgotten as long as mankind exists. The song is till today one of everybody’s favourite songs, and if you want to relive the good old teenage days once again or maybe pay a homage to the singer-Chester, who gifted us with some evergreen unforgettable songs that will be always cherished; strum the chords on your guitar or play it on your piano and enjoy those good old memories that will come rushing back to you.

,New,new
Somebody’s Guitar Chords with Capo & Strumming – Enrique Iglesias - Abhijeet,Some songs never age and always remain evergreen. No matter when it was released, but these songs continue to mesmerise us. Somebody’s me by Enrique Iglesias is one such enchanting number. Hailing from the genre of pop, this melody was written by Enrique himself along with John Shanks and Kara DioGuardi. From the album Insomniac, this romantic chartbuster has a different emotion of its own. The symphony was created by just the guitars and the drums and maybe that is why it’s a soulful and serenading rendition. The guitar chords have a novice level of difficulty and are predominantly played in the G scale. The progression is subtle and harmonious. The song can also be covered easily on the piano as the notations are simple. Amateurs can pick up the chords effortlessly. The song has a very soothing feeling with the moderate tempo and the signature 4/4 beats with a not so slow rhythm.

: Somebody’s me is a song about the parted and unrequited love. Often we cannot be together with our beloved but she is unforgettable and the memories of that bygone someone special will always haunt us. These very emotions have been crafted into the lyrics of this touching melody. The lyrics are heart rendering and can be related by anyone facing the agonies of the unattained love. The music is very groovy and makes one sway to the tune. The rhythm runs in a leisurely manner and with it takes us into a world of happy memories and good times. The beats are quite feet tapping and the entire composition is euphonious. Enrique as usual captivates us with his gentle and dulcet vocals and his voice has a tinge of melancholy that harmonises well with the pensive mood. The melody is enticing by all means and due to the perfect combination of the refreshing tune, emotional lyrics and the mesmerising vocals, it makes the listener come back to it.

: This song has indeed a charm of its own. What makes it more special for us, especially for the youngsters in their 20s, is that it takes you back to the good old school days when you used to sing this song for that innocent crush on your schoolmate or that pretty girl in the tuition with whom it was unreciprocated or maybe the love story didn’t work out. The millennial kids and the teens grew up listening to this melody and that’s why this song will always hold a special place in our hearts. The song won a lot of applause and accolades all over the world and though it was released in 2007, the song remains a romantic chartbuster even today. The soundtrack is very refreshing like the gush of wind on a scorching summer day. The song has a beautiful Spanish version Alguien Soy Yo. Through 3 minutes 58 seconds the track transports us into a different world through the smooth flow of rhythm and music. The song is a perfect companion on a solo trip, and well, if you happen to run into that old lover or childhood crush of yours, strum this piece of melody on your guitar or play it on the piano and maybe Cupid will conspire this time to reunite the two of you.

We are sharing the chords of Tum hi ho from Aashiqui 2 because it is that song. An evergreen romantic chart buster it has been sung by the mellifluous Arijit Singh, composed by the creative genius Mithoon Sharma and penned by him only for this romantic serenading ballad. The melody is a very soulful rendition with a soothing moderately paced tempo and a signature beat. The song is a wonderful symphony created from the euphonious piano, the guitar and the strings. The chords on the guitar are of the novice level which the beginners can learn effortlessly. The progression of the chords is slow and harmonious. From the romantic genre, this song is bewitching by all means and instantaneously will transport you into a world of love and passion.

: This song is beyond praise and perfection. From the beginning introductory aria played on the piano, the song starts creating a very blissful and refreshing mood. The tune is indeed dulcet and mellow. Whenever the piano is played, a romantic and amorous sensation is always found there and this is created here as well. And the sweet music from the strings adds to the lovey-dovey feel of this soundtrack. The lyrics of this song is very heart warming and relatable. It very beautifully portrays the emotions we harbor towards us beloved and our heartfelt feelings towards our better half. How the beloved means the entire world to the love struck man has been presented marvelously in this enticing ballad. Arijit Singh as usual weaves magic with his deep and velvety smooth vocals and his romantic and melodious crooning is very pleasant to the ears. His bewitching voice indeed hypnotises the audience to come back to this track again and again.

: Tum hi ho is rightfully the romantic song of the decade. Released years back, this song continues to the rule our hearts and mesmerize us. This song will never age and will forever remain evergreen. Filmed on the amazing and sizzling duo – Shraddha Kapoor and Aditya Roy Kapoor, their intensely romantic chemistry is a treat for the eyes. The melody has a lot of versions that have been added to the film. Apart from that, it is a track with the most number of covers made on the guitars and the piano. What makes the soundtrack so wonderful and endearing is that slow groovy rhythm that makes one sway to the tune. The music on the piano is indeed heart touching and the guitar chords strike the inner chords of our hearts. Tum hi ho is a perfect song for a long drive, a romantic candle light dinner, or just a simple date with you and your lover serenading in each other’s arms. And well if you are planning to surprise her on her birthday or anniversary: or just want to confess your love and propose to your crush in front of everyone, then strum these guitar chords and see how she blushes and goes all gaga over you.

Tujhko Jo Paaya/Mere Bina Guitar Chords with Strumming & Capo | CROOK - Abhijeet,
column2: In this article, about the song chords from the movie CROOK (most of us know this song name by Tujhko Jo Paaya) we have shared two different versions of the chord progression. One version is about the chords with capo placed on the second fret of your guitar and the other is without the capo. To the play chords using the capo is only recommended for beginners though, but it won’t make any difference to the sound of both the versions. The chords that we have used in the non-capo version are D, Bm, F#m, & A, if you want to play it using the capo then you need to play C, G, Am, Em. We have also shared the details about the chord transposition with capo you can refer that for your knowledge. Lets come to the strumming pattern, the recommended pattern is D D UUD DDU while you can also play D D UUD UUD where D is the Down Stroke and U is the Up Stroke.

EASY: Mere Mehboob Qayamat Hogi Guitar Chords with Strumming - Abhijeet,Parting and betrayals are worst and is really a terrible thing that can happen to you. And this pain has been very beautifully expressed in this evergreen melody Mere Mehboob from Mr. X in Bombay. Sung by the one and only Kishore Kumar, this track has been composed by the creative genius Laxmikant-Pyarelal and penned by the poetic Anand Bakshi. This melody uses the percussions, the flutes, the violins and the guitars to create that mesmerising music. The chords on the guitar are simple and easy with a harmonious progression, so the beginners and the novice players can pick them effortlessly. This soundtrack is from the filmy soundtrack genre with a moderately paced tempo and a signature 4/4 beat. An intensely heart rendering number, this song is a gem indeed.

: This melody has a profound sense of pathos infused in it. The song has some crests and troughs in the interlude, as the rhythm drops the tempo and again picks it up in the verses. This makes the song intensely endearing to the audience. Laxmikant-Pyarelal is the only duo who could have done such a commendable job. The lyrics are very conversational and heart touching. The song very effectively captures that ‘Abhimaan’ of the jilted lover and every rejected and heartbroken lovelorn lover can relate to this track. The song has a very doleful and morose feel and that makes it very harmonising to the pensive and crestfallen mood. That is why one keeps on coming back to this number. Kishore Kumar needs no praise as he is someone who will always remain unparalled. His extremely dulcet and powerful vocals are as usual enchanting and that is what makes this song unforgettable.

: Mere Mehboob is an evergreen rendition that will never age. It will forever enthral us and all the upcoming future generations. This song is one of the best songs sung by Kishore Da. This number has been filmed on him and the beautiful actress Kumkum and the video though a black and white one speaks of a very colourful and emotional story. Since the video has been picturised on Kishor Da only he could feel the pain and the emotions of the character he was portraying and that is why the song has that wistful emotion that the character faces and nobody could have sung it better than him. This song has a lot of covers and reprised versions made years later, and two of them have been made by Sanam Puri and Honey Singh. This song is just ideal for someone who is facing the agonies of a separation or who has been badly betrayed and ditched by the beloved without any apparent reason. So if you are one of those suffering from any such similar situations, let your grief take the form of music and let those guitar chords that you strum speak for your woes and miseries to the world outside.

,New,new
Guitar: Mon Aamar Chords by Arko | Shesh Theke Shuru - Abhijeet,
column2: This is a 4 Chord song, the chords that we have used are A, D, E and F#m. We suggest you to play the song chords with D D UDUD D as the strumming pattern while the other pattern that we have for you is D UDUD UDUD where D is Down Stroke and U is Up Stroke and the song has BPM of 100.

column1: The feeling of falling in love and that fresh new charming emotion is something that we always cherish for life, and Mon Amar from Shesh theke Shuru is that serenading track that justifies this statement. Sung and composed by the brilliant Arko, this track has been penned by the poetic Pranjol. This guitar based number uses the drums, the violins and the piano at the background melodiously. The tempo is moderately paced with a signature 4/4 beat. This song is from the filmi soundtrack genre and the smooth flowing rhythm and the feet tapping beats are mesmerising. The guitar chords are very simple and the novice player can pick them in a jiffy. The progression of the chords is harmonious and subtle and this song is indeed a soulful rendition.
d – Down Stroke on lower three strings
: D D UDUD D or D UDUD UDUD
Baan vashi ra bhaste thaka jaane

: Arko is a creative genius and is extremely talented. With the use of just few instruments and no heavy or exciting beats he has given us a very gentle and soothing track that is quite pleasant to the ears. The song has a very fascinating sensation about it. The lyrics are conversational and poetic. Pranjol has done a commendable job in carving and giving shape to those inexpressible feeling buried deep inside our hearts. The song talks about how the mind of the restless lover goes on searching for the beloved walking down the streets of his city and how she rests in his eyes. The song is about the feelings of a one sided lover and it has been beautifully conveyed through this melody. Arko has very gentle and velvety smooth vocals that make this track very heartfelt and heart- warming. His voice is mesmerising and attracts the listeners to listen to this song repeatedly on loop.

,New,new
Ishqe Di Chashni Guitar Chords - Strum | Bharat - Salman Khan - Abhijeet,Hello! So yeah we have the chords of a song that released today from Sallu bhai’s Bharat movie –

. The chords that we have used in the song are a bit hard for beginners so we have also shared the overview with capo too. The chords without the capo are F#, G#, D#m, B & C# where F# is the key of the song and the chords with capo on the first fret are F, G, Dm, A#, & C.

Love is the feeling that adds the various beautiful colours to our monotonous lives. It is like a sweetmeat that gives us happiness and fulfils our cravings. And Ishqe di Chashn from Bharat is that wonderful song which justifies this claim. Sung by the mellifluent Vishal and Shekhar featuring Abhijeet Srivastava, the melody was penned by the poetic Irshad Kamil and was composed by the maestros Vishal and Shekhar. With the acoustic guitars and esraj, this talented duo has created this mesmerising melody. The guitar chords are a bit intricate and the beginner will find it a little difficult to pick up the chords. Thus the capo is needed for all the novice players. The progression of the chords is smooth and harmonious and the piece is played on the F scale predominantly. The song has a moderately paced tempo with signature 4/4 beats and a very soothing rhythm.
: D UDUD UDUD or D UUD UUD

: This melody has a very serenading tune. With the guitars and the esraj, Vishal and Shekhar have created an amazing fusion. The song has romance filled in every bit of it and the lyrics are extremely conversational. The soundtrack very subtly talks about how the beloved is enchantingly beautiful and heavenly. The lady love has been compared to a sweet, a delicacy which is intensely sugary and has a satisfying taste. The song is filled with metaphors and that is why this track is endearing to us. The tune is indeed very groovy and makes us sway to it. The beats are feet tapping and gentle. No heavy or exciting beats have been used which imparts to the song that slow and soulful feel. Abhijeet Srivastava has done a brilliant job. His performance is stellar and his smooth, tender and dulcet vocals are refreshing to hear. He has perfectly captured the feel of the song in his voice and that is the reason why we find this melody so lovely.

Ishqe di Chashni is a song meant to break all records. An extremely mellifluous soundtrack, this melody is very catchy and makes us hum the hook line – “Ishqe di Chashni” throughout the day. Like Dil Diyan Gallan and Lapata, this number is another path breaking song that has been filmed on Salman and Katrina, and their chemistry is indeed sizzling. Shot on breath taking locales, the video of this soundtrack is a feast to the eyes. This musical treat is totally bewitching and will always remain so in the future as well. Though in the movie’s context, the song portrays a love story setting from the 1942s, but in reality it caters to the love stories of all periods and generation. From the feature film soundtrack genre, this song is that sweet summer tempest after days of scorching heat. The number has a breath of newness in it and that’s why no matter how many times it has been played on loop, each time the song sounds as fresh as morning dew. The song has been made ideally for a romantic date with the lover, or as that song through which you want to say your feelings out loud to your beloved to make her yours.

,New,new
Guitar: Chale Aana Chords with Capo by Armaan Malik | Dede Pyar De - Abhijeet,Love is a bitter and sweet emotion. While there will be happiness and rays of sunshine somedays there will also be sadness and rainy days occasionally. This emotion has been melodiously captured in Chale Aana from De De Pyar De. Sung by the mellifluous Armaan Malik, it has been penned by Kunaal Vermaa and composed by Amaal Malik. The symphony has been created by a variety of exotic instruments like the flutes, the acoustic and the electric guitars, the live bass, the dholaks, the tablas, the violins and the violas and the strings. The guitar chords are very simple and can be picked up by the amateurs easily. The progression of the chords is subtle and harmonious. The rhythm is very groovy due to a signature 4/4 beat and a moderately paced tempo. The melody is a soothing rendition.
The original key scale is F#m while to serve the beginners with the easy chords we have used the guitar capo on the second fret so the chords of the song becomes Em, D, C, Am, & Bm.
: D DU UDU or D DU DU D
: D D UUU DUDU or D UUD D or DDU UDU

: We often have to part with our beloved due to various situations. Even if the parting is mutual, separations are always pathetic and agonising. This has been beautifully captured in the conversational and the touching lyrics of this track. Kunaal Vermaa has done a wonderful job in expressing those unsaid words into a melody so soulful. Amaal Malik is truly a maestro in all the senses. His creative genius is beyond praise, as with so many beautiful instruments he has created a piece of art that is not only mesmerising but also very refreshing. He has composed a beautiful contemporary fusion by mixing and matching the various instruments. And what adds further charm to this melody is the dulcet and euphonious voice of Armaan Malik. His gentle and smooth vocals are indeed spell binding. The passion that he brings out in his voice adds to that heart rendering feel of this serenading number.

Dhvani Bhanushali - Guitar: Vaaste Chords with Strumming - Abhijeet,
column2: Released a day back and already trending at number 2 position on YouTube is the new single by Nikhil D’Souza and Dhvani Bhanushali named Vaaste. The song has been composed by the creative genius Tanishk Bagchi and the lyrics have been penned down by Arafat Mehmood. The melody is very happy and romantic with a catchy chorus. The soulful tune has actually made it even more popular and given the video 10 million views within a day.

: The song in the video begins with a very sweet and soft piano playing in the background and then the Antara is sung by Nikhil. However, in the audio version the song begins with the strumming of the guitar . The rhythm is moderately paced and feet tapping. Acoustic guitars have been predominantly used in the background along with the ukulele and the piano to add to the charm of this musical piece. The song is a smooth flow for about 3 minutes 16 seconds. It is very enthralling with a groovy beat that makes one sway to the song. The lyrics are romantic and charming. The duet talks about how the lovebirds can’t really do without each other and how they are deeply enamoured. Mehmood with ease has captured the beautiful emotions of love in the lyrics and presented it in this melody.

The singers have done a brilliant job. Nikhil, with his melodious and gentle voice weaves magic. But however the show stealer was Dhvani. After Sunidhi Chauhan and Shreya Ghoshal, Dhvani is the next big thing in the music industry of Bollywood. With hits like Leja re, Dilbar, Main teri hoon and Ishare tere, Dhvani with her euphonious and dulcet voice is all set to rule our hearts. Her voice is very sweet and smooth which is indeed captivating.

: Vaaste has already become a hit song because of the splendid performances of the singers and the sweet-toned music composition. The song has made the audience fall in love with it and keep on playing it on loop. The song is an appropriate date song and will make the lovers serenade to this soulful melody and do a little jig.

,New,new
Guitar: Tu Thodi Der Chords with Capo & Strumming | Half Girlfriend - Abhijeet,
column2: Music has the power to say those unsaid words, put feelings into words and then into a melody. The perfect example of this is Tu thodi der from Half Girlfriend. A recreated version of Farhan Saeed’s Tu Thodi dair, the song was picturised on Shraddha Kapoor and Arjun Kapoor. The melody was sung by India’s new nightingale Shreya Ghoshal and the enchanting Farhan Saaed. The song was released in 2017 and became one of the most played love songs of that year. The melody has an English reprised version titled Stay a little longer sung by Anushka Shahaney. The chords that we have used in the song are G, D, Em, C, & Am with the guitar capo on the second fret.
